relevant_findings.general: Elderly man in NAD, awake, alert, pleasant
relevant_findings.HEENT: EOMI, PERRL, sclera anicteric, conjunctivae clear, OP moist and without lesion
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate, normal S1, S2. No murmurs/rubs/gallops.
relevant_findings.chest: Respirations were unlabored, no accessory muscle use. Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no crackles, wheezes or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, tender in LLQ, non-distended, no rebound/guarding
relevant_findings.skin: No rash, but numerous telangiectasias over hands and face
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, oriented x 3. Able to relate history without difficulty. Cranial nerves II-XII intact. Normal bulk, strength and tone throughout.
